summary: This module defines a training pipeline for a ControlNet text‑to‑image model using the Megatron framework. It assembles a customized Trainer with appropriate overrides, integrates image logging, and manages experiment configuration via Hydra and the NeMo experiment manager.
business_intent: Enable scalable, configurable training of ControlNet models for generating images from textual prompts, facilitating research and production deployment of advanced multimodal AI systems.
